name: [Warrior]
description: Through rigorous training, you've honed your body. Your endurance is exceptional, you tire slowly. Every 5 minutes increase stamina. Per level: +0.55 STR, +0.2 DEX, +0.1 INT, +0.15 PER

name: [Berserker]
description: Rage fuels your strikes. Your fury makes you strike 15% faster. Your endurance is exceptional, you tire slowly. Every 5 minutes increase stamina. Per level: +0.75 STR, +0.45 DEX, +0.1 INT, +0.2 PER

name: [Guardian]
description: A living shield, protecting all. Your skin is naturally armored (+4 physical armor). Your endurance is exceptional, you tire slowly. Every 5 minutes increase stamina. Per level: +0.6 STR, +0.15 DEX, +0.15 INT, +0.6 PER

name: [Mage]
description: The arcane flows through you naturally. Vast reserves of mana (+1000 mana, +25% mana regen). Per level: +0.1 STR, +0.05 DEX, +0.55 INT, +0.3 PER

name: [Mystic]
description: You channel raw destructive power. Your hands glow with light (15). Immense reserves of mana (+2500 mana, +50% mana regen). Per level: +0.1 STR, +0.2 DEX, +0.75 INT, +0.45 PER

name: [Scholar]
description: Knowledge flows to you effortlessly. You read with supernatural comprehension (+100% reading speed). Moderate mana reserves (+800 mana, +20% mana regen). Per level: +0.05 STR, +0.15 DEX, +0.8 INT, +0.5 PER

name: [Rogue]
description: Cunning and dexterous. A master of finesse and guile. Per level: +0.1 STR, +0.55 DEX, +0.15 INT, +0.2 PER

name: [Scout]
description: Master tracker and observer. Your senses are razor sharp. Your movements are unnaturally fast (5% faster movement, +1 speed per level). Per level: +0.15 STR, +0.3 DEX, +0.05 INT, +0.5 PER

name: [Acrobat]
description: A blur of graceful motion. Your reflexes are supernatural (+6 dodge bonus). Your movements flow with impossible speed (8% faster movement, +1.5 speed per level). Per level: +0.1 STR, +0.8 DEX, +0.2 INT, +0.4 PER

name: [Assassin]
description: A shadow striking without warning. You move in complete silence (-40% noise, +30% hearing). You are nearly invisible (+50% stealth). Your movements blur with supernatural speed (8% faster movement, +1.5 speed per level). Per level: +0.1 STR, +0.75 DEX, +0.35 INT, +0.3 PER

name: [Ranger]
description: Master sharpshooter with perfect aim. You see clearly in darkness (night vision 20 tiles). You require less water (half at level 10, none at 20). Your movements are unnaturally fast (5% faster movement, +1 speed per level). Per level: +0.15 STR, +0.45 DEX, +0.1 INT, +0.8 PER

name: [Craftsman]
description: Master of all trades. Your skilled hands work with incredible precision (+1 to all crafting skills, +40% crafting speed). Per level: +0.2 STR, +0.3 DEX, +0.4 INT, +0.6 PER

name: [Bionic Symbiote]
description: Your cells integrate seamlessly with cybernetics. Your body naturally generates bionic power (regenerates 2 kJ per level every 5 minutes).

name: [Vital Essence]
description: Life energy flows through you. You are perpetually healthy and healing (increases health by 0.02 per level every 5 minutes).

name: [Purifying Blood]
description: Your blood purifies toxins and radiation. You naturally cleanse radiation from your body (removes 0.5 radiation per level every 5 minutes).

name: [Resistant Skin]
description: Your skin is unnaturally resistant to environmental hazards. You naturally resist corrosive and thermal damage (+4 acid armor, +4 heat armor).

name: [Lightweight Frame]
description: Your body is optimized for speed over strength. You move much faster but can't carry as much (25% faster movement, 25% less carry capacity).

name: [Strong Back]
description: You carry burdens that would crush others. Your carrying capacity is significantly increased (+40% carry capacity).

name: [Tireless]
description: Your stamina seems endless. You can exert yourself for much longer (+50% max stamina).

name: [Mana Font]
description: Mana flows through you like a river. You possess increased magical power (+1250 mana, +25% mana regen, +12.5% mana multiplier).

name: [Blink Step]
description: You move with supernatural quickness. Your movements are a blur (25% faster movement).

name: [Natural Healer]
description: Your body repairs itself rapidly. Your wounds close at an accelerated rate (+50% HP regen while awake, +100% HP regen while resting).

name: [Adaptive Biology]
description: Your body adapts to harsh conditions. You naturally resist extreme temperatures (-750, 750 bodytemp units).

name: [Glass Cannon]
description: Immense power, fragile form. You move with tremendous speed (+20% speed) but are more vulnerable (-2 physical armor).

name: [Juggernaut]
description: An unstoppable force. You are incredibly strong (+100% carry capacity, +8 physical armor) but move very slowly (30% slower movement, 15% slower speed).

name: [Arcane Battery]
description: You store immense magical energy. Your mana reserves are enormous (+5000 mana) but regenerate very slowly (50% slower mana regen).

name: [Iron Fists]
description: Your fists are hardened weapons. Your unarmed strikes deal devastating damage (+6 bash, +4 cut, +3 pierce damage).

name: [Efficient Metabolism]
description: Your body uses resources efficiently. You need 40% less food and get tired 30% slower.

name: [Combat Reflexes]
description: You react instantly to threats. Your reflexes grant superior evasion (+3 dodge bonus).

name: [Acrobat]
description: You land gracefully from any height. You take 95% less falling damage and gain +2 dodge bonus.

name: [Tireless Worker]
description: You never seem to tire. You get tired 50% slower and recover from fatigue 80% faster.

name: [Rapid Metabolism]
description: Your body processes energy rapidly. You regenerate stamina 100% faster but need 40% more food.

name: [Scentless]
description: You emit almost no scent. Enemies that track by smell have much harder time detecting you (90% reduced scent).

name: [Clotting Factor]
description: Your blood clots almost instantly. You are highly resistant to bleeding (1000 bleed resistance).

name: [Regenerator]
description: Your limbs mend at an incredible rate. Broken and damaged limbs heal 100% faster.

name: [Master Craftsman]
description: Your hands are skilled at creation. You craft 20% faster and build 20% faster.

name: [Pack Rat]
description: You know how to pack efficiently. Your worn containers hold 50% more items.

name: [Creature Harvester]
description: You instinctively know how to harvest creatures. You can efficiently harvest materials with your bare hands (butchering quality 40).

name: [Vampiric]
description: You drain life essence from your foes. Heal for 0.5% of monster's max HP per level (minimum 1 HP) on kill.
